perturbation.original_text: The undersigned acknowledge that each shall be responsible for the timely filing of any amendments, and for the completeness and accuracy of the information concerning the undersigned or contained herein and therein, but shall not be responsible for the completeness and accuracy of the information concerning the others.
perturbation.changed_text: The undersigned acknowledge that each shall be responsible for the timely filing of initial filings only. Responsibility for the completeness and accuracy of the information is shared amongst all filers regardless of whose information it concerns.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by stating that responsibility for the completeness and accuracy of information is shared, contradicting the original clause that limits responsibility to information concerning only the undersigned. This creates uncertainty about who is liable for inaccuracies.

perturbation.original_text: In accordance with Rule 13d-1(k)(1) promulgated under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, the undersigned hereby agree to the joint filing with each of the Reporting Persons (as such term is defined in the Schedule 13D referred to below) on behalf of each of them of a statement on Schedule 13D (including amendments thereto and statements on Schedule 13G) with respect to the Common Stock, par value $0.01 per share of Macy's, Inc., a corporation organized under the laws of the State of Delaware, and that this agreement may be included as an exhibit to such joint filing.
perturbation.changed_text: In accordance with Rule 13d-1(k)(1) promulgated under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, the undersigned hereby agree to the joint filing with each of the Reporting Persons of a statement on Schedule 13D with respect to the Common Stock of Macy's, Inc. Amendments to Schedule 13G will be filed independently by each Reporting Person. This agreement may be included as an exhibit to such joint filing and also to any individual filings.
perturbation.explanation: The modification introduces a contradiction by stating that amendments to Schedule 13G will be filed independently. The original text states the agreement covers statements on Schedule 13G. This change could lead to disputes regarding who is responsible for filing amendments to 13G filings and whether they are subject to joint liability.
